refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Tracing modules will subclass GstTracer and register through gst_tracer_register(). Modules can attach to various hook-types - see gst_tracing_register_hook(). When invoked they receive hook specific contextual data, which they must not modify.

refsect2.title: gst_tracer_register ()
refsect2.para: Create a new tracer-factory capable of instantiating objects of the type and add the factory to plugin .

entry.para: A GstPlugin, or NULL for a static typefind function.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE, if the registering succeeded, FALSE on error

refsect2.title: gst_tracing_register_hook ()
refsect2.para: Register func to be called when the trace hook detail is getting invoked. Use NULL for detail to register to all hooks.
